channel.title: Help with spawns and doing things
channel.description:
I am new at using mopar and i would like to know somethings 1. Is there a way that i can get all the spawns? Like, as close as 100% of all the spawns as possible. 2. When i spawn an npc, i cant pickpocket it, i cant trade it, when i atack it dies in 1 hit. How do i fix these problems.
Thanks in return

item.title: Help with spawns and doing things
item.dc:creator: @bessomi bessomi
item.description:
@bessomi wrote:

Whats the closest anyone has got with the spawn thingy

Read full topic
item.source: Help with spawns and doing things

item.title: Help with spawns and doing things
item.dc:creator: @Rog3r Rog3r
item.description:
@Rog3r wrote:

Answer to 1: Yeah, if you really had the time and put in the effort
Answer to 2: Pickpocket - (wont give you a tutorial but here’s a rough idea)
|
|
First click, make it a void - and create a void, so when you click the NPC, it gives you money, etc.

For trading, first click NPC, make it: 'wanneshop = ’ and then in shops.cfg add the correct shop ID.
When you attack the NPC, it dies in 1 hit…

Change the 4. (i.e 3 4 3)
The 4 is its health, if you don’t see it, then add one.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with spawns and doing things
